de.embl.rieslab.emu.micromanager.mmproperties

Class FloatMMProperty

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.embl.rieslab.emu.micromanager.mmproperties.MMProperty<java.lang.Float>
      • de.embl.rieslab.emu.micromanager.mmproperties.FloatMMProperty

  • public class FloatMMProperty
extends MMProperty<java.lang.Float>
    Wrapper for a Micro-manager device property with float value. The property can be read-only or not, with limits or with a set of allowed values.
    Author:
    Joran Deschamps

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class de.embl.rieslab.emu.micromanager.mmproperties.MMProperty

        public boolean isAllowed(java.lang.Float val)
        Tests if val is allowed. If the property has neither limits nor allowed values, then the method should return true.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        True if allowed, false otherwise.
